text: Kate Hudson and Angelina Jolie enjoy family day out at Kung Fu Panda 3 premiere It was all about the kids at the Hollywood premiere of the animated film Kung Fu Panda 3. Actresses Angelina Jolie, Kate Hudson and Naomi Watts all brought along their children for the film event, on Saturday. Although she walked the red carpet alone, Angelina Jolie was later joined by five of her children.
